PackageUpdate.Name: installer
PackageUpdate.Description: Performs the installation of the Haskell toolchain.

PackageUpdate.Name: ghc
PackageUpdate.Description: GHC (Glasgow Haskell Compiler) is a state-of-the-art, open source, compiler and interactive environment for the functional language Haskell.

PackageUpdate.Name: cabal
PackageUpdate.Description: Cabal is a tool for building and packaging Haskell libraries and programs.

PackageUpdate.Name: stack
PackageUpdate.Description: Stack is a tool for developing Haskell projects. It is aimed at Haskellers both new and experienced.

PackageUpdate.Name: hls
PackageUpdate.Description: HLS (Haskell Language Server) provides features like code completion, "go to definition", linting, formatting and refactoring for many code editors, including Visual Studio Code, Vim and Emacs.

PackageUpdate.Name: tools
PackageUpdate.Description: Miscellaneous tools for developing Haskell projects.
